title: World Population Clock
description:
Dynamic demographic country rankings at any date between 1950 and 2100.
All you need to know about world population.
You can access to any demographic data for all countries:
- Total Population
- Births and deaths total and rate
- Natural increase rate of the population
- Fertility
- Life expectancy
- Median age
- Sex ratio at birth
- Sex ratio in population
In the map you can visualize the evolution of the population.
For each country you can get the evolution of all demographic data from 1950 to 2100.
You can also access to population pyramids for the world, all the continents and all the countries.
The data is from the World Population Prospects of the United Nations 2019.
